news.title: First war-injured Gazan child arrives in UK for treatment
news.summary: Majid, 15, was almost killed by an Israeli tank shell last February. He has finally arrived in the UK for reconstructive surgery.

news.title: Man, 76, arrested on suspicion of poisoning as summer camp children fall ill
news.summary: Police received a report of children feeling unwell on Sunday before turning up at the camp on Monday.

news.title: Nurses threaten strike action over 3.6% pay increase
news.summary: Royal College of Nursing wants urgent talks on way NHS contract works, warning nurses feel undervalued.

news.title: Jess Glynne calls White House deportation video with Jet2 song 'sick'
news.summary: The post was captioned: "When ICE books you a one-way Jet2 holiday to deportation. Nothing beats it!"

news.title: Most popular boys' and girls' names of 2024 revealed
news.summary: New entrants into the top 100 most popular in England and Wales include Athena and Yahya.

news.title: 'Staff were physically sick': Dine and dash mental health toll on restaurant workers
news.summary: A former restaurateur says some staff are left "physically sick" after dine and dash incidents.

news.title: Children's author Allan Ahlberg dies aged 87
news.summary: He wrote more than 150 books, including The Jolly Postman and Each Peach Pear Plum.

news.title: Former nurse loses legal challenge over private gender clinic
news.summary: A High Court challenge over the registration of England's first private gender clinic for teenagers has failed.

news.title: MMA fighter Conor McGregor loses appeal in civil rape case
news.summary: In November McGregor was ordered to pay damages to Nikita Hand, who accused him of raping her in a hotel in Dublin in 2018.

news.title: Ofcom investigates 34 porn sites over age checks
news.summary: Ofcom said on Friday that more than 6,000 porn sites would begin verifying users, but it believes some are ignoring the new rules.
